meanings.definition: Having a specified kind of heart or heart as specified.
meanings.sent1: She is kind-hearted and always helps others in need.
meanings.sent2: The generous-hearted person donated to charity regularly.
meanings.sent3: The warm-hearted teacher made learning fun for her students.
meanings.sent4: His lion-hearted bravery in the face of danger inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The cold-hearted villain showed no remorse for his actions.

meanings.sent1: The lion-hearted warrior fearlessly faced his enemies.
meanings.sent2: The faint-hearted child was scared of the dark.
meanings.sent3: The kind-hearted puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The lion-hearted leader led his team to victory.
meanings.sent5: The cold-hearted criminal showed no empathy for his victims.

meanings.definition: Having a heart of a specified kind.
meanings.sent1: The lion-hearted knight fought bravely in battle.
meanings.sent2: The tender-hearted nurse cared for her patients with compassion.
meanings.sent3: The light-hearted joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The lion-hearted athlete never gave up, even when injured.
meanings.sent5: The cold-hearted dictator ruled with an iron fist.
